mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( A.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK ) FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY_ATTRIBUTE B, ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SORTED_ROW, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK, A.ME_CCOMPANYID, A.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK FROM MAST_POST D, HIST_DESIGNATION C, TMG_EMPLOYEES B, ( SELECT B.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK, B.ME_CCOMPANYID, B.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, B.ME_CKANANAME, B.ME_CKANJINAME FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES B, ( ${param.empListsql} ) A WHERE B.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = A.CUST AND B.ME_CCOMPANYID = A.COMP AND B.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = A.EMPID AND B.ME_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND B.ME_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) ) A LEFT JOIN TMG_EMPLOYEE_ATTRIBUTE T ON T.TES_CCUSTOMERID = A.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND T.TES_CCOMPANYID = A.ME_CCOMPANYID AND T.TES_CEMPLOYEEID = A.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK AND T.TES_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE('${param.baseDate}','yyyy/MM/dd') AND T.TES_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE('${param.baseDate}','yyyy/MM/dd') AND T.TES_CTYPE LIKE 'TMG_WORKPLACE%' WHERE B.TEM_CCUSTOMERID = A.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND B.TEM_CCOMPANYID = A.ME_CCOMPANYID AND B.TEM_CEMPLOYEEID = A.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK AND B.TEM_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND B.TEM_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND C.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = B.TEM_CCUSTOMERID AND C.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK = B.TEM_CCOMPANYID AND C.HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = B.TEM_CEMPLOYEEID AND C.HD_DSTARTDATE_CK <= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND C.HD_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND D.MAP_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = C.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND D.MAP_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = C.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND D.MAP_CPOSTID_CK = C.HD_CPOSTID_FK AND D.MAP_DSTART <= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND D.MAP_DEND >= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND D.MAP_CLANGUAGE = '${param.lang}' ) A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM TMG_GROUP_MEMBER GRP WHERE GRP.TGRM_CCUSTOMERID = A.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND GRP.TGRM_CCOMPANYID = A.ME_CCOMPANYID AND GRP.TGRM_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND GRP.TGRM_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND GRP.TGRM_CEMPLOYEEID = A.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK ) ) A WHERE B.TPHA_CCUSTOMERID (+) = A.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND B.TPHA_CCOMPANYID (+) = A.ME_CCOMPANYID AND B.TPHA_CEMPLOYEEID (+) = A.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK AND B.TPHA_DSTARTDATE (+) <= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ) AND B.TPHA_DENDDATE (+) >= TO_DATE( '${param.baseDate}', 'yyyy/MM/dd' )

SELECT TRUNC( A.AVGWORKTIME / 60 ) AS AVGWORKTIME1, MOD( A.AVGWORKTIME, 60 ) AS AVGWORKTIME2, B.WORKINGDAYS_WEEK AS WORKINGDAYS_WEEK FROM ( SELECT TMG_F_GET_AVGWORKTIME ( #{employeeId}, TO_DATE( #{yyyymmdd}, 'yyyy/MM/dd' ), #{customerId}, #{companyId} ) AS AVGWORKTIME FROM DUAL ) A, ( SELECT TMG_F_GET_NWORKINGDAYS_WEEK ( #{employeeId}, TO_DATE( #{yyyymmdd}, 'yyyy/MM/dd' ), #{customerId}, #{companyId} ) AS WORKINGDAYS_WEEK FROM DUAL ) B

SELECT TO_CHAR( A.TPHA_DSTARTDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD' ) AS TPHA_DSTARTDATE, ( SELECT TO_CHAR( MAX( TPHA_DENDDATE ), 'YYYY/MM/DD' ) FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY_ATTRIBUTE B WHERE B.TPHA_CCUSTOMERID = A.TPHA_CCUSTOMERID AND B.TPHA_CCOMPANYID = A.TPHA_CCOMPANYID AND B.TPHA_CEMPLOYEEID = A.TPHA_CEMPLOYEEID AND B.TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME = A.TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME AND B.TPHA_DSTARTDATE >= A.TPHA_DSTARTDATE AND ( B.TPHA_DENDDATE <= A.LEAD_DSTART OR A.LEAD_DSTART IS NULL ) ) AS TPHA_DENDDATE, A.TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME, A.TPHA_NWORKINGDAYS_WEEK FROM ( SELECT TPHA_CCUSTOMERID, TPHA_CCOMPANYID, TPHA_CEMPLOYEEID, A.TPHA_DSTARTDATE, LEAD ( A.TPHA_DSTARTDATE ) OVER ( ORDER BY A.TPHA_DSTARTDATE ) LEAD_DSTART, A.TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME, A.TPHA_NWORKINGDAYS_WEEK FROM ( SELECT TPHA_CCUSTOMERID, TPHA_CCOMPANYID, TPHA_CEMPLOYEEID, TPHA_DSTARTDATE, TPHA_DENDDATE, TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME, TPHA_NWORKINGDAYS_WEEK, LAG ( TPHA_DENDDATE ) OVER ( ORDER BY TPHA_DSTARTDATE ) + 1 AS LAG_DEND, LAG ( TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME ) OVER ( ORDER BY TPHA_DSTARTDATE ) AS LAG_NAVGWORKTIME FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY_ATTRIBUTE A WHERE A.TPHA_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND A.TPHA_CCOMPANYID = #{companyId} AND A.TPHA_CEMPLOYEEID = #{employeeId} ) A WHERE A.TPHA_DSTARTDATE != A.LAG_DEND OR A.TPHA_NAVGWORKTIME != A.LAG_NAVGWORKTIME OR A.LAG_DEND IS NULL ) A ORDER BY TPHA_DSTARTDATE ;
